column1: GAD occurs more often in women than in men.

Other symptoms of GAD include: - Problems concentrating - Fatigue - Irritability - Problems falling or staying asleep, or sleep that is restless and unsatisfying - Restlessness when awake The person may also have other physical symptoms.
Talk Therapy Many types of talk therapy may be helpful for GAD.
One common and effective talk therapy is cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT).
Depression and substance abuse may occur with an anxiety disorder.
